Furthermore, any formal extradition process is typically complex and time-consuming, making its completion before the deadline unlikely. My probability is not lower because Sheikh Hasina has a history of being a determined and bold political actor, and a calculated, high-risk return to galvanize her party cannot be entirely dismissed. The political situation is also fluid, and unforeseen events could precipitate a return. I would increase my forecast if there were credible reports of a political deal for her safe return or if India signaled it would expedite an extradition. Conversely, I would lower it if more severe charges were filed against her or if she publicly revised her timeline for returning.
